title: Endbringer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- (First) End your target’s existence, dealing an Unstoppable attack to them.
- (Second) Control a target, forcing them to use their night abilities against another.
- (Third) Roleblock two players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can be killed by Town Protectives using your Unstoppable attack, however your target will still die unless granted Invincible or higher defense.
- While ending someone’s existence your name will be revealed to a single other visitor at random, including another Last member. Your name will not be revealed to someone who died.
- Your controlled target's ability will always succeed. They become immune to any effects which would have stopped them from acting.

desc:
Post 1285
*We shall bring about the end.*
Roleblock Immune (While Third)
Control Immune (While Second)
